You braced yourself as she kissed you again, leaving black lipstick on your face causing her to giggle. She kissed you again but with more force this time. No only that, but she began full on making out with you and not giving you room to breathe.

Then you saw her lips part as they made room for her tongue. It dragged across your face and covered you in saliva. Eventually she pulled away and a trail of her saliva carried from your face to her lips. She merely brushed it off as she smiled at you. "Told you you wouldn't regret this, now stay here till I get home." She then started to put you__________.

1353222.title: Turn her down.

choices: Head for your best bud, Dalton.
Try Jake. He's a bit of a jock, but he's a friend.
Eric's a good bet. He's nice and friendly.
Suddenly, a hand grabs you from above!
14.content:
list choices (locker, bag, clothes, hide, somewhere else)

Dalton 5'4"
Jake 5'9"
Erik 6'1"

You slowly come to at the sensation of your body vibrating, as if someone's trying to shake you awake. Groaning, you sit up and press a hand against your forehead. You've got a mild headache and a ringing in your ears, and it feels like the earth is wobbling underneath you. Dazed and disoriented, you slowly force your eyes to squint open to an impossible sight.

All around you stretches a cavernous expanse, perhaps half a mile long and a quarter mile wide. Towering walls lined with odd geometric shapes reach up so far that you have to crane your head to see an oddly clear gray sky with what looks like several white suns beating down. The ground is patterned with square sections of stone and a checkerboard system of foot-deep grooves. Unusual plateau-like monuments of rusted metal and old wood cast shadows across the landscape. It's so dramatically alien in first appearance that it takes a moment or two for your mind to truly process the sight before you and realize the truth: this enormous space is the locker room at school, scaled up several dozen times! Or rather, you think as you rise to a stand on shaking legs, you're the one who shrank down, to only a couple of inches tall. You try to think back, but can only remember coming out of gym class a little early and entering the room. Whatever caused you to lose most of your height is a blur. At least your clothes, a flimsy sleeveless t-shirt and a pair of grey boxers, shrank with you...

You're shaken from your realization as the entrance door swings wide open. The rest of the boys from the gym stampede in, and it's a breathtaking sight. Each guy, most of whom you'd had a few inches over, is now a towering, two hundred foot behemoth of unimaginable power. Muscles stronger than heavy machinery flexed with ease, and each step one of them made covered half a hundred feet in stride. You watch, quiet and awed, as these school-age giants go about their day with the casual air common to a locker room. It's the end of the last period, which means the showers are open. Most of the guys simply change out of their gym clothes and head home, but there's the usual crowd - including your friends - that linger around and strip to wash up after class. You find yourself unable to look away from the enormous young men and every inch of their naked, sweaty bodies. It no longer mattered whether you had been straight at regular size; at your shrunken stature, their figures are so vast and powerful that they demand attention and attraction.

You manage to snap out of your stupor long enough to realize you have a choice to make. Your best friend Dalton is chatting it up with one of the freshmen, but he'll be gone by the time you can reach him. You could try to get his attention. A little further away, the musclebound Jake was boxer-clad and flexing his muscles to the envy of his peers. And at the other end of the room, lanky Eric was quietly waiting for the crowd to disperse before he took a turn in the showers.
14.title: Men's Locker Room

choices: Jake takes a shower with you
Jake goes for a swim in the pool with you
Jake takes a nap on his bed with you on top of him
142.content:
You’re hunkered down in the corner of the boy’s locker room as the rest of the class barges in through the steel door. One by one, the boys take turns using the shower stalls, while others don’t even bother with the showers and just change into their regular clothes. You hear locker doors open and slam shut while some guys just stand around and chat. Other guys stand in front of the big mirror as they brush their hair. Another group is busy putting on their clothes so they can catch the bus home. Finally, of the twenty guys, only a few are left. You breathe a deep sigh of relief.

“So, Jake… I was gonna have Jeff play defense… What do you think?” Erik asked him.

“Dude! Jeff is a little guy… He’s only 5-foot-3… But he’s got a strong leg… Put him as a kicker or a punter! He’ll get crushed if you put him on defense!” Jake replied.

“Are you sure? Jeff’s my friend! We can use him on defense and—“Erik continued.

But Jake grabbed him by the arm with a powerful grip, which made him stop talking.

“Listen to me! Are you crazy? Do you want him to get hurt? Put him on as a kicker or a punter! He can’t block those big guys! They’ll send him to the hospital! Are you nuts?” Jake insisted. “You gotta take care of your little guys!”

“Y-y-yeah… You’re right, Jake!” Erik stuttered, before he got dressed and walked off.

“Of course! We don’t want any more injured players!” Jake shouted at him.

Erik then walked out of the locker room leaving Jake alone with… You!

You try to walk along the wall of the locker room when a big hand suddenly scoops you up.

“HEY!” you shout. “LEMME GO!”

The grip is strong…. Powerful.

You struggle to let go, but it’s useless. Then, you look up and you realize you’re in Jake’s hand.

“What have we here?” the big muscular giant says.

“JAKE!” you shout at him. “Please! I got shrunk. Please help me!”

“Well, I kinda like helping little guys who are smaller and… weaker than me…” Jake smiled, as he turned to face his other, which he happily flexed. A huge bicep rose up from the top of his arm, which seemed like a massive boulder to you. Why, his bicep alone was bigger than your entire body! Your jaw dropped at the sight of it.

“Holy shit!” you gasp. You can only imagine how infinitely strong Jake must be compared to you. In a way, you couldn’t help but like the big muscle boy. He had short, straight, jet black hair and deep, brown eyes. He had a nice golden tan and he was built like a tank, like a junior bodybuilder.

“Alright, little dude… I’m taking you home with me! You’ll be my training partner!” Jake smiled. “In return, I’ll take care of you! It’ll be awesome! Come, I’ll take you home where I can take a nice hot shower!”

Jake put on his shorts, his socks, his shoes and his tank top. Then, he swung his bag around his shoulder before he placed you in the palm of his hand. Once outside, he put you in his pocket of his shorts while he hopped on his bike and rode home.
142.title: Try Jake. He's a bit of a jock, but he'...

145.title: Suddenly, a hand grabs you from above!

152.content:
Standing on a math class desk, you wander aimlessly trying to figure a way out of your predicament. There's no immediate way off of the desk, jumping to the ground could mean death. This, however, is the least of your problems. You catch a glimpse of the clock, and you realize the first period bell is about to ring! You run back and forth trying to find a way off the desk, but it's too late - the bell rings and the whole class floods in.

You decide to lie down and stay still. 'If anyone sees me, they'll think I'm a doll or something' you say to yourself. 'Hide in plain sight and nobody will notice, right?'
152.title: Math class

1521.content:
Everyone gets to their seats and the class period begins. This includes your seat, you look up and see that it's Celeste - a girl you know fairly well. She's a pretty good student and an honest person, but she's been going through a rough time with the school officials recently. She'd taken the fall for some of her troublemaking friends, and the math teacher - Mr. Overland - threatened to give her detention if she was caught one more time. It's a shame since Celeste was entirely well meaning and just doing her friends a favor.

You know there's a chance a good person like her would help you out, but you don't want to startle her and alert he whole room to your presence. Do you let her know you're there?
1521.title: Right

15211.content:
"Hey, Celeste, it's me".

Celeste with a puzzled look glances down and sees you. She's briefly startled but manages to gain control of herself without making a scene. She quickly covers you with a book to shield you from anyone else's gaze, and gets right to the questions:

"How are you so small? Did someone do this to you? What happened"

"I don't know - we can find out later. First I need you to get me somewhere safe"

They continue discussing what they're going to do, but can they do it without gathering the attention of the ever-suspicious Mr. Overland?
15211.title: Yes

choices: Clasped in her hands behind her back
152111.content:
Mr. Overland, right in the middle of his lesson on Trigonometric Identities, finds himself interrupted by Celeste's antics. He won't stand for that. He walks straight up to her desk.

Celeste notices him approaching and has to think fast and hide you, but where?
152111.title: No

1521112.content:
Celeste quickly grabs you and holds you behind her back. Unfortunately she wasn't quite quick enough

"I saw you put something behind your back, Celeste. Show me your hands".

You're worried and shaking like hell, but there's nothing you can do. Fortunately Celeste is quick-witted, and moves you to another hiding spot.

Where does she hide you?
1521112.title: Clasped in her hands behind her back

choices: She stuffs you deeper into her butt so you stay there when she stands
15211122.content:
Celeste ever so slightly lifts herself up and crams you underneath her butt, a place you took some interest in when normal-sized. Fortunately she is wearing yoga pants, and the cushion-like softness of her rear end prevents you from being crushed. It's a strange mix of ecstasy and discomfort, being smushed under such a lovely behind.

Celeste shows Mr. Overland her now-empty hands, and with a look of discontent asks him "Convinced yet?".

Unfortunately Mr. Overland is not quite convinced, and asks her to stand up. Celeste has to be quick yet again to keep from being caught.

Where is your next hiding spot?
15211122.title: Under her butt

choices: She opens up and reveals you
152111221.content:
In an impressive display of slight-of-hand, Celeste removes you from underneath her butt and quickly stuffs you into her mouth while Mr. Overland inspects the chair. It's hot and moist, and smells of spearmint toothpaste. You have doubts about being inside her mouth, but you convince yourself that Celeste knows what she is doing and will get you out of this.

Mr. Overland's tenacity has finally ceased, and he decides to let Celeste off the hook. He looks her in the face one last time, and sees a slight buldge in her left cheek.

"You have something in your mouth, Celeste" he says. "If it's food, finish it. Otherwise open up".

There's no way for Celeste to get you out this time. She took a few moments to contemplate her next move. If Mr. Overland saw what was in there, she would make a huge scene and as promised, would most certainly get detention. She really didn't want that - what if it stayed on her permanent record? College admission offices might see it!

Celeste has to decide what to do
152111221.title: In her mouth

1521112212.content:
Celeste can't get detention, her parents would be so mad and it could even pop up on her transcript.

She tentatively but unmistakably tilts her head back..

and swallows.

You have no idea what is going on as you descend down her esophagus, and it's only when you feel the sting of her stomach's pool of digestive enzymes and hydrochloric acid that you realize what's going on - but by then all hope has left you.

Celeste opens up to reveal an empty mouth.

"Well then, I guess you weren't hiding anything after all. I apologize for getting so worked up. Now then, can anyone here tell me what happens when you add Cosine^2(X) to Sine^2(X)?".

Relieved, Celeste continues to work. She felt mildly guilty about swallowing another human being whole, but hey - at least she wouldn't get detention.
1521112212.title: She.... doesn't

Hannah, who wants a seat cushion
Jessica, who will prank someone using you
1522.content:
A voice booms out "Huh...what's this?"

Who is it?
1522.title: Wrong

choices: She puts you in her bag
She drops you in a classmate’s bra
15223.content:
“That was a stupid idea,” you think as you see a giant hand swoop down towards you. “Who the hell has a doll in high school?” Unfortunately, you don’t have time to think of another plan.

“Cory? What the hell?”

Of all the people to find you, Jessica Roth may not be the worst, but she’s certainly not your top pick. She’d moved to the district her freshman year, quickly establishing herself as the class clown, giving even Ryan Davis a run for his money. From her sarcastic comments in class to commandeering the intercom system, Jessica has terrorized the school for three years; there was a rumor that Mr. Hillman had quit because of her antics, though you personally doubted it.

A large part of what made Jessica so scary for students and staff alike was her sheer unpredictability; one week she’d be taping parodies of the Bee Movie around the school and the next she’d be arming the freshman with water balloons. The entire school had dreaded April 1st this year, but Jessica has actually decided to do absolutely nothing that day, which (though you’d never admit it) you though was both brilliant and hilarious. But while you thought she was funny, you’d never really talked much, so it wasn’t like you knew how she operated.

“How the hell did you get like this?”

“I have no idea,” you say honestly. “It just kinda... happened.”

“Well, I know what to do,” she says matter-of-factly.
15223.title: Jessica, the prankster

choices: It’s Patricia, the annoying smart kid
153.content:
You could have sworn it was just a brief nap.

Having pulled an all-nighter for your biology test (which you’re pretty sure you still failed), you were running on about half an hour of sleep, the shitty coffee your school sells, and a the promise of an afternoon nap. Unfortunately, while you were planning on taking that nap after school, the nap decided to take you during your third period English class with Ms. Allen.

As the class got settled in and started to discuss that night’s Lord of the Flies reading (you skimmed the Sparknotes), you decided to close your eyes briefly for a quick nap, figuring someone would wake you up. Apparently you had too much faith in your classmates, because the first thing you notice is that the room is empty. As you rub your eyes, you then realize that something isn’t right. It takes your brain a minute to process before it hits.

You’re standing on your desk, tiny, naked, and very alone.

Before you have time to start panicking, the door opens.
153.title: English class

1531.content:

"Damn, didn't thought she has some sexy feet..Now looking over her thighs. They are in fact, pretty attractive...Is she?!"

Her thighs are turning over the other side and you see Ms Allen's pink underwear.

"Niiiiice. I get to stare at her underwear. I am so glad that I got to be tiny. Wouldn't mind staying here for a while."

You stay ogling her legs and underwear. Then she has a sign of relief.

"Oh shit. I better hurry."

You run towards the red heel and jump inside of it. You move at the toes space.She puts it back and moves towards her car.She enters the car and starts it.

She drives and reaches her house.

She leaves her keys and takes her shoes off and much to her shock. She sees you.

"HOLY SHIT CORY.. WHAT HAPPENED TO YOU? WHY ARE YOU SO TINY? NAKED AND WERE INSIDE MY RED HEEL WITH MY TOES?"

You explained everything.

"I.....see. I guess it makes sense. You can stay for tonight with me. But that's it! We need to call your parents for this."

"I see."

"I will have a shower. You can wait for me."

"Got it!"

She goes inside the bathroom. You decide to take a peek. You head over the bathroom. You look at Miss Allen's naked butt and she turns around to enter the bathtub. You move around and you get to see her full naked body in the entire glory. You get so hard and you begin to marstubate. Miss Allen looks at your way.

You.....
